cliModal.description: Paste the following into your terminal to do this task in IPFS via the command line. Remember that you'll need to replace placeholders with your specific parameters.
cliModal.extraNotes: If you've made changes to the config in this page's code editor that you'd like to save, click the download icon next to the copy button to download it as a JSON file.

tour.tooltip: Click this button any time for a guided tour on the current page.
